title: When can I play League on Catalina 10.15.1?
body: Ever since I updated my mac to Catalina, I wasn't able to open league's client at all.

replies.body: When you bootcamp an OS that is not anathema to games. Then it will never break again, and run far better as well.

You can run windows on an apple computer, in fact most users do, as a ton of important software either has no mac version or runs like shit on it.

https://support.apple.com/boot-camp
That is a great suggestion. I use Mac OS for so long that I forgot I can do that. Thanks.
